thread.title: Chrissy Teigen Adds To Memes Comparing John Legend To Arthur
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen Adds To Memes Comparing John Legend To Arthur

author: Julia Brucculieri
title: Chrissy Teigen Adds To Memes Comparing John Legend To Arthur
text:
Chrissy Teigen Adds To Memes Comparing John Legend To Arthur She's too good. By Julia Brucculieri 
This is why Chrissy Teigen is the queen of Twitter. 
Earlier this week, people on the social media app pointed out how much her husband, John Legend , looks like the animated-character-turned-beloved-internet-meme Arthur. 
A user who goes by the name Emily Sowah shared the below tweet, which prompted some hilarious responses. John Legend look like Arthur lowkey pic.twitter.com/bfeG3cYo4M â€” b s t f r n d â˜¥ ðŸ¥‘ (@bstfrnd__) February 20, 2017 
In response, Teigen posted a perfect meme of her own: John when you tell him he looks like Arthur pic.twitter.com/0NW3NDtAb1 â€” christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 21, 2017 
Sheâ€™s too good. 
As it turns out, though, Legend had apparently never heard of Arthur (!!!) until folks online started comparing him to the cartoon aardvark. @chrissyteigen I hadn't even heard of this Arthur character til now. Was he around when I was a kid? â€” John Legend (@johnlegend) February 21, 2017 
Meanwhile, weâ€™re over here like: â€” Lauren Warren (@iamlaurenp) February 21, 2017 ALSO ON HUFFPOST Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Chrissy Teigen and John Legend 1
